website_summaries.verdict: Boot stays warm and dry no matter what weather you throw at it.
cons: Runs a little small, so you may want to buy up a half to a full size

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair
customer_reviews.text: The boots definitely run about half size smaller than your normal shoe which I expected from reading reviews. I wear 8.5-9 and ordered a 9.5. They fit great! Love them. They're really comfortable to be out in the woods all day. My feet stayed dry and warm. I had enough room to wear heavy socks in them but they were also comfortable with regular socks. It hasn't been that cold so I haven't worn them in any kind of extreme temps. Great boots overall though
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but cut small.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots very much. They are lightweight and comfortable, but they are cut small. I normally wear a size 7.5 to 8. I ordered up 1/2 a size to an 8.5 and they fit snugly -there is no room to add a toe warmer if needed, or a second pair of socks. I am going to try the size 9 to see which is better. I will review again after I have had a chance to field test them this winter for warmth and dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, too small
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot, but size 8.5 was too small for me. I bought them a month ago for 84 dollars. I wear 8.5 in my other Danner boots. The price was almost 80 bucks more for the next size. I tried to exchange these for a size 9, but Amazon was very unhelpful. They also keep rejecting my reviews of this product. Let's see if they delete this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: 000 gram thinsulate insulation is amazing. Here in Eastern Idaho it's been well below ...
customer_reviews.text: Actual size runs small. Buy a full size up. The 1,000 gram thinsulate insulation is amazing. Here in Eastern Idaho it's been well below zero this winter. Spending time outside has been no problem. The feet stay warm and cozy. However, as with most all commercial boot insoles, do yourself a favor and buy some good insoles. It makes a world of difference in your hiking/walking experience.
customer_reviews.author: Carpenter For Christ

customer_reviews.title: Oh, what a tossup! I love both of them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to choose between this one and this one  I ordered a half-size up from my normal size and they are just right. Like the other pair, they seem instantly comfortable and break-in seems like it will not be difficult. A size 9 shoe weighs just under 700g, presumably due to the Thinsulate insulation (the other one is 600g). I think these would be great if I lived in an area that gets snow and ice, as they warmed up right away. I'm so tempted to keep both pairs!
customer_reviews.author: LadyMarlone

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my wife. We hiked in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. We hiked in a few inches of snow for a couple of miles and her feet stayed warm and dry. Her feet weren't sore at all and she is looking forward to using them some more.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good hunting boot that would stand up to mountain treking. Even in rocky terrain, they proved to be comfortable. My feet stayed warm, the quality is fantastic. This boot is great, well worth the money. The boot runs a bit on the small side, as I typically wear a 7.5, but ordered an 8 to allow for heavy socks. So glad I went with the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: wildfive

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned insole and sides are comfortable. Mainly they are very warm
customer_reviews.text: Cushioned insole and sides are comfortable. Mainly they are very warm. My feet never got cold in spite of cold, windy and wet conditions. I wear them with wool blend boot socks.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Byrd

customer_reviews.title: warm boot
customer_reviews.text: I have had the boots for a few weeks. They are very comfortable. It has been raining here in utah for the last two weeks and my feet stay dry. I have been walking in the outdoors and I have slipped a few times. But other than the slipping it is a great boot. I tried these on in a store and so I knew to order half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer France

customer_reviews.title: Size too large, no 1/2 size available
customer_reviews.text: I like Danners, this boot was a tad too big. Didnt have 1/2 size avail so I ordered a full size larger. They also were too bulky when I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: sue mccune

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. Warm and comfortable! Definitely order 1/2 size bigger than you normally wear as stated in most other reviews. Someone stated the embroidery is pink not orange as shown in rhe pic. It is definitely orange on my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. A true 7.5.well done
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, comfortable the first day. Haven't been out in the cold snow yet
customer_reviews.author: James m.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing!! My feet didn’t get cold or uncomfortable a single hunt, including in -0F degree wind chills and actual temps of -10F and less.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it if you’re a legit hunter
customer_reviews.text: It’s not waterproof at all. I went on a hunt trip with my buddies, got into typical Montana weather. At the end of the day I was ringing water out of my socks while their feet were dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.text: My boots came as if someone else had already worn them. Stickers missing and sides all scratched up. Love how they fit but wondering how ripped off I got..
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Used Amazon's size chart and according to it, I should be a 6.5. I ordered a 7.5 and they are just barely big enough. Order 1 to 1.5 sizes up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I have used these twice now in Colorado for spring turkey hunting and spring here is not a normal spring. They are packed ready for a PA turkey hunt this upcoming week. I am very happy with them so far and there was no issues breaking them in, comfortable the first time I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Peak Property

customer_reviews.title: Great snow hiking/hunting boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, very comfortable and supportive to hike in, and I love the insulation. I needed something for hiking up mountains/across rocky areas for long periods in variable conditions, and also for sitting for hours after the hike. My feet were hot while snowmobiling, so they should work well next December in deer season. Great traction so far when hiking in snow and icy conditions compared to other hunting boots I have had. My last pair of Danner's lasted me over 15 years with about a month of hard use each year, hoping these do the same!
customer_reviews.author: Icicle

customer_reviews.title: snug
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL boots! They feel really snug, but it may well be because I don't usually wear this kind of boot. Also, I wear 8, but got 8 1/2, half size bigger, to accommodate thick, wool, winter socks. After I test wore them for a couple of days, I discovered they were super comfortable and supportive boots. With my high arch, my arch was tired at the end of the day, because they are a little tight across the top.... even when I loosened the shoestrings to max looseness. I do not regret purchasing these boots.... and look forward to winter already.
customer_reviews.author: D. Design

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 1/2 and ordered a 7 as the other reviews stated to go a half size bigger. These boots are too tight. There should not have to be a break in period of boots of any kind. They either fit or they don't. Ordering a half size bigger gives you length but not width. Very disappointed with this purchase. Returning for a refund and will find something else that is for the serious hunter and not so much about the fashion statement! Lose the pink and make boots that fit right!
customer_reviews.author: K

product_meta.title: Danner Women's High Ground MO Breakup-W
product_meta.description:
Not recraftable

At Danner, they are craftsmen. They pay attention to details. They forgo quantity for quality, with the knowledge that the boots they craft are no better than the hands that create them.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Outdoor
